TypeSignature.Value: public class CatchExceptionMiddleware<T> : Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware where T : Exception
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CatchExceptionMiddleware`1<(class System.Exception) T> extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.IMiddleware
Public Class CatchExceptionMiddleware(Of T) Implements IMiddleware
type CatchExceptionMiddleware<'T (requires 'T :> Exception)> = class interface IMiddleware

Docs.typeparam: The type of the exception that you want to catch. This can be 'Exception' to catch all or a specific type of exception
Docs.summary: This piece of middleware can be added to allow you to handle exceptions when they are thrown within your bot's code or middleware further down the pipeline. Using this handler you might send an appropriate message to the user to let them know that something has gone wrong. You can specify the type of exception the middleware should catch and this middleware can be added multiple times to allow you to handle different exception types in different ways.
